snippet.title: Sonic & Blaze: SAGE 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
I am not good at video editing.

Its time, Sonic & Blaze Demo 3 will be playable at SAGE 2023! You'll get to play through all 3 acts of Blue Coast and Metro Heights, and the demo also saves your best score, time, ranking, total ring count, and total Red Ring count and will be compatible with future demos. Be sure to grab all the red rings in each stage to unlock a Super Burning surprise!

Have fun and make sure to leave me some reviews 🙏🏿

SAGE 2023 Website: https://sagexpo.org/
Sonic & Blaze Booth: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-blaze-sage-2023.1798/
